remarks: Value of the set of monic polynomials.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
uc1pval.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
uc1pval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
uc1pval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` P ) $.
uc1pval.d $e |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) $.
mon1pval.m $e |- M = ( Monic1p ` R ) $.
mon1pval.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
mon1pval $p |- M = { f e. B | ( f =/= .0. /\ ( ( coe1 ` f ) ` ( D ` f ) ) = .1. ) } $.
$d .0. f $.
$d .1. f $.
$d B f $.
$d D f $.
$d R f $.
